welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bound Brook! This charming city is known for its historic landmarks and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bound Brook has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments for the region.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, per day. Paid options available for longer access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport is dedicated to handling international flights and offers duty-free shopping and currency exchange services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
